recipes.title: Mish-Mash
recipes.method: 1.Finely dice bell peppers. Coarsely chop tomatoes. 2.In a large heavy skillet, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. First, add the onions and garlic, and saut√© for about 2 minutes, until the onions are soft, but not completely cooked. 3.Add the bell peppers and mix well. Cover and cook for about 5 minutes. 4. Add the tomatoes, stir, cover and cook for another 5 to 7 minutes. 5.Add the sirene and mix. Pour the eggs. Stir occasionally until the mixture is less liquid.6.Finally add the parsley and cook for a minute before removing from heat. 7.Serve hot

recipes.title: Avocado and Smoked Salmon
recipes.method: 1. No preparation required!just grab and enjoy 2.Season with fresh lemon juice and black pepper to taste
